Description: A loitering missile which will float nearby its launch point until a ship enters its activation zone. When a ship's magnetic signature is detected, the mine will orient towards the direction and activate a radar seeker. Size: 3 Cruise Speed: 700 m/s Range: 3,850 m Warhead: Type: Explosive Impact Armor Penetration: 200 cm Component Damage: 5000 hp Blast Angle: 100 Seeker: Type: Active - RADAR Range: 1,750 m FOV: 30 deg Gain: 25 dB Power: 150 kW Supports TRPs: Yes Pushoff Distance: 200m Arming Time: 90s Battery Life: Unlimited Activation Range: 2,000m Networked: No
